content: Blockchain ek digital ledger hai jo internet par hai aur jis mein financial transactions record kiye jate hain. Iska sab se khaas feature ye hai ke ye ledger tamper-proof hai, matlab koi bhi us mein changes nahi kar sakta. Ye ledger network ke sare nodes mein distribute hota hai, isliye ye decentralized hai aur isme security high hoti hai. Har transaction ke sath ek unique digital signature hoti hai jise verify kiya jata hai. Ye technology cryptocurrencies ke liye popular hai lekin iska use bahut sare areas mein ho raha hai, jaise ki supply chain management, healthcare, voting systems, aur bahut kuch.
